I enjoy this game, but without the Survive With Friends option I probably would not play this game at all. I admit it's more my style than some other Multiplayer Horror Survival Games because as a Survivor there is an end goal, which is to escape, instead of going endlessly until the killer finds everyone. 

Mostly Dead By Daylight (or DBD) is frustrating because the community and other players are very hit or miss. I've played with some amazing people and some awful ones -- this is normal with multiplayers, but the community for this game specifically frustrates me because it doesn't seem to be moderated at all. While I have met some fantastic people, I play for fun, and am generally not very good and remain in the lower ranks. Some survivors will purposefully get you killed as a fellow survivor, and sometimes people are very harsh if you're still learning as a killer.

If you have friends willing to play with you, I definitely recommend it. If you don't, I would probably stay away -- the chances of who you may end up playing with are incredibly random and sometimes really frustrating.

(Also I am begging the devs to please fix the ranking/matchmaking system.)

Got this game right after it came out. It's had it's ups and downs but it was always a great and fun game. Now in 2019 I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone, not even people who deserve to be miserable. I took a break to see if I really would notice a change and after about 4 months can confirm that it feels like a different game in the worst kind of way. Maybe I'll keep it installed for Kill You Friends because at least that is still not terrible. But who knows at this point.

Not talking about the cries over the killer or survivors. I'm talking about the bugs.
The game crashes a lot.
You get stuck on the lobby trying to find a match, and if you're with friends, that's even worse.
Once we've waited 1 and a half hour, fixing, closing and open the game several times, until we gave up.
Sometimes if you're played the entire round, get killed or run away alive, the game can crashes.
And you can lost all you're bloodpoint earned on this match AND you're items.
I made a complaint on their site and they just answer me basically, that they don't care and can't do anything about it.
Not to mention the bugs inside the round.
You can have fun playing the game, get a lot of jumpscares or killing the others, but be prepare for a lot, A LOT of bugs... Oh, and a lot of expensive skins.
And do not expect to play with your friends... 
That's almost impossible.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Não falando sobre o mimimi sobre o assassino ou sobreviventes. Eu estou falando sobre os bugs.
O jogo trava muito!
Você fica preso no lobby tentando encontrar uma partida e se estiver com amigos, isso é bem pior.
Uma vez que esperamos 1 hora e meia, consertando, fechando e abrindo o jogo várias vezes, até desistirmos.
Se você jogar a rodada inteira, for morto ou fugir, o jogo pode travar.
E você pode perder todos os seus pontos de sangue ganhos nesta partida E seus itens.
Fiz uma reclamação no site e eles simplesmente me responderam que não se importam e não podem fazer nada a respeito. (clichê)
Sem mencionar os erros dentro da rodada.
Você pode se divertir com o jogo, ter muitos jumpscares, mas esteja preparado para muitos, MUITOS bugs ...
E não espere jogar com seus amigos...
Isso é quase impossível.

Antes lo recomendaba, ya no. Es injugable, los devs le pusieron skill based matchmaking lo que hace que en cada partida todos la vivan al maximo como si fuese una ranked. Los killers tienen nulo impacto y los survivors le pasan la bolsa escrotal por la cara a cada uno. Bugs y hackers en el 85% de las partidas, servidores de mierda. Intentaron arreglar el desync del juego beneficiando a los survivors haciendo que muchos de los golpes que se comen no cuenten a pesar de que gritan y el killer hace la animacion de limpiar el arma haciendo que jugar de killer sea extremadamente frustrante. ¿Que dijeron los devs cuando les preguntaron si planeaban arreglar su juego? "Si les resulta frustrante el dbd prueben jugando otra cosa"
Con un poco de suerte cuando salga el VHS y le meta el dedo en el cul* al dbd activen y arreglen su juego en vez de seguir haciendo colaboraciones para conseguir plata.
BTW el VHS va a ser gratuito y estando en beta cerrada no tiene 1 pto bug. Es evidente cuando una empresa quiere que su producto sea bueno y cuando quiere solo plata.

Hello! So i have been playing this game since first release and let me tell you that these game have evolved very wisely and the amount of DLC hype and cosmetics are really great. The game is a 4v1 horror game that will make it a no-horror experience in no time if you put enough time to it. Its a game about cooperation and strategy. Yes, the gameplay can get a little repetitive but each game is kind of unique in a way and right now with Disconnecting penaltys and dedicated servers i can say it feels like a good, complete experience. 

Pros:
-Variety of killers (Some can only be purchased with money, others can be purchased with in-game currency)
-Perks to keep you alive/Make you a killing machine
-Good matchmaking (im in the US and at the right times, not 2am)
-Challenging Learning Curve
-Movie Killers and survivors (DLC tho)
-Ranking System 
-Variety Of Maps
-Free and Premium Battle pass
-No pay to win

Cons:
-Can feel a bit repetitive
-Some Perks are limited to certain characters until u get them to level 40 (Doesn;t take long)
-Sometimes the connection just f* ups
-Toxic Community
-Ranking doesn't have a rewards system
-The game can get unfair if the 4 survivors are communicating
-Noobs have to get better with no help from the game at all (No tutorials)
-Can get really long wait times at some hours of the day or some regions

Overall i give it a 7/10, solid experience that will get better and better, a classic 1v4 game. I always recommend to all my friends.
